definitions.definition: One who, or that which, consumes.
Someone who trades money for goods or services as an individual.
definitions.example: This new system favours the consumer over the producer.

definitions.definition: (by extension) The consumer base of a product, service or business.
definitions.example: Our consumers are upwardly mobile and middle-class.

definitions.definition: An organism (heterotroph) that uses other organisms for food in order to gain energy.
